params.name: errors
params.description: Paradigm to follow when decoding bytes to UTF-8. Seebytes.decode for more information.

params.name: unk_token
params.description: The unknown token. A token that is not in the vocabulary cannot be converted to an ID and is set to be thistoken instead.

params.name: pad_token
params.description: The pad token of the sequence.

params.name: add_prefix_space
params.description: Whether or not to add an initial space to the input. This allows to treat the leading word just as anyother word. (CLVP tokenizer detect beginning of words by the preceding space).

params.name: add_bos_token
params.description: Whether to add bos_token in front of the sequence when add_special_tokens=True.

params.name: add_eos_token
params.description: Whether to add eos_token in end of the sequence when add_special_tokens=True.
